Name: Roman Triumph
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with a Militiae Gladius, a Militiae Great Blade and a Militiae Warden Axe.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: While this model is alive all friendly MAGISTRO MALITIAE Formations are considered to be within 6” of a friendly MAGISTRO MALITIAE CHARACTER for the purposes of the Servants of the Emperor rule.

While a friendly MAGISTRO MALITIAE Formation is within 6” of this model then models in that formation may re-roll failed hit and would rolls in the Melee Combat Step. In addition, this model can never be affected by the The Emperor’s Bodyguard ability.

While a friendly MAGISTRO MALITIAE Formation is within 6” of this model then models in that formation may improve their Move and Dash Characteristics by 1”. In addition, while a friendly MAGISTRO MALITIAE Formation is within 6” of this model, then if a ranged attack targets that Formation then the attacking model must subtract 1 from its hit roll.
